column1: I want to post an Announcement for my business. How can I do that?
column2: To post an Announcement to your business, go to the Manage Announcement section of your business Dashboard. Now click on "Post New Announcement" link to post a new announcement. This announcement will be visible on the business Profile business.

column1: How can I edit my Joining Date in a business I’ve joined?
column2: To edit your joining date in a business you’ve joined, go the "Members" tab of that business and mouse-over on the Settings icon. Now, click on "Edit" to edit your joining date.

column1: My friend has added me to a business. How can I edit my Membership Role in that business?
column2: To edit your Membership Role in a business you’ve joined, go the "Members" tab of that business and mouse-over on the Settings icon. Now, click on "Edit" to edit the Role.

column1: I do not want to receive notifications for posts in a business that I’ve joined. How can I stop them?
column2: To stop receiving notifications from a business you've joined, go the "Members" tab of that business and mouse-over on the Settings icon. Now, click on "Notification Settings" to choose what do you want to get notified about.

column1: Can I send message to all the members of my business in one go?
column2: Yes, you can send messages to the members of your business in one go by using the "Message Members" link available in the quick links on your business Profile business.

column1: How can I leave a business?
column2:
To leave a business, please follow the steps below:

1. Go to the "business" that you want to leave.

2. Click on "Leavebusiness" from the quicklinks on the business Profile business.

3. From the popup, click on "Leavebusiness" button to leave the business.


Tip: You can also leave a business by visiting "Mybusinesses".

column1: How can I join a business?
column2:
To join a business, please follow the steps below:

1. Go to the "business" that you want to join.

2. Click on "Joinbusiness" from the quicklinks on the business Profile business.

3. From the popup, click on "Join business" button to join the business.
